title: I Want Powers
description: THE SUPERIOR PEOPLE is a series of short stories about people with powers, and people who want powers!I WANT POWERS is a story about wanting to become superior. His entire life, Edgar has desperately wanted superpowers, but the older he gets, the more he doubts it will ever happen. He tries everything he can to fill that void, but in the end, the only thing that will make him feel whole is becoming one of the superior people!
author: Stephen Carey
